title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser & Node.js integrations.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter for Ollama models, providing standard LLM & chat interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and tool-calling support.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama HTTP API for Rails apps.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for Ollama with interactive REPL and shell completions.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri & React.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI commands for summarizing notes & brainstorming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot powered by Ollama models with slash commands.
